WARLOCK RUNNER HELP 
 
 Score increases over time, and killing enemies will grant extra score. 
 
 Gargant: Basic enemy, very weak, but watch out as a lot of them will spawn over time. Killing these grants 10 score. 
 
 Dragon: Large, very fast and quite strong, they are a formidable enemy! Killing these will grant 25 score and will spawn at level 2. 
 
 Demon: Slow moving but extremely tough enemies, watch out as they shoot hellfire. Killing these grants 100 and will spawn at level 3. 
 
 As the levels increase, not only will more difficult enemies spawn, but the spawn rates of the enimes will also increase over time. 
 
 Level 1: Unlocked when starting game. Level 2: Unlocked at 5000 or more score. Level 3: Unlocked at 10,000 or more score. 
 
 HAVE FUN!!! Game created by ya boi Jounaid Ruhomaun
